name: Grip Jewel
description:
Run through 4 unique vaults as fast as possible, Climb the leaderboard and earn the top placement! In the platformer you play as a thief with a magnet, you can use said magnet to grapple towards walls and steal valuable gems!

--NOTE THIS GAME IS MENT TO BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN, NOT DOING SO WILL CAUSE ISSUES THAT EFFECT GAMEPLAY

-- THERE IS A BUG WHERE THE GAME CRASHES AFTER THE TUTORIAL. TO BYPASS THIS ,  AFTER YOU HAVE COMPLETED THE TUTORIAL RELOAD YOUR BROWSER.
